summary: Provides utilities for managing Numba compatibility within the project, including checks for CPU and CUDA support, handling of strict compatibility mode, and a context manager to temporarily adjust strictness settings. It also offers a helper to conditionally skip CUDA-related tests when the required capabilities are unavailable.
business_intent: Enable safe and configurable use of Numba-accelerated code by detecting hardware and software support, allowing developers to enforce strict compatibility rules, and preventing execution of unsupported CUDA tests, thereby improving reliability and portability of the library.
